Literature.Title: Lassomycin, a ribosomally synthesized cyclic peptide, kills mycobacterium tuberculosis by targeting the ATP-dependent protease ClpC1P1P2.
Literature.Author: Gavrish E, Sit CS, Cao S, Kandror O, Spoering A, Peoples A, Ling L, Fetterman A, Hughes D, Bissell A, Torrey H, Akopian T, Mueller A, Epstein S, Goldberg A, Clardy J, Lewis K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=0.78-1.56µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis 186(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis 83(MIC=1.56-3.1µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis 84(MIC=1.56-3.1µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis 85(MIC=1.56-3.1µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis 7(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis 86(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis 136(MIC=0.78µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis 189(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis 3(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis 30(MIC=0.78µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis mc2-6020(MIC=0.39-0.78µg/ml),Mycobacterium avium subsp. paratuberculosis(MIC=0.125-0.25µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis(MIC=0.78-2µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes(MIC=12.5-25µg/ml),Bifidobacterium longum(MIC=25-50µg/ml),Clostridioides difficile(MIC=>50µg/ml),Clostridium perfringens(MIC=>50µg/ml),Limosilactobacillus reuteri(MIC=>50µg/ml),Lacticaseibacillus casei(MIC=>50µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans(MIC=>50µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=>50µg/ml),Bacillus anthracis Sterne(MIC=>50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>50µg/ml),Bacteroides fragilis(MIC=>50µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>50µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>50µg/ml)
